name: weblogger
description: Enables a web page to send log messages to a local file.
author: Justin Dolske

preferences.name: logDir
preferences.title: Directory for logs
preferences.description: The location where the log files will be written.

preferences.name: allowedHost
preferences.title: Allowed host
preferences.description: Allow logging from this host (eg 'http://site.com'). You can use '*' to allow any host, but that is dangerous.

preferences.name: rebootOdds
preferences.title: Percent chance of rebooting after logging
preferences.description: If non-zero, this is the percent chance to reboot after logging a message
